name: Blizzard
description: Summon a blizzard that slows nearby enemies for 40% and deals 125% water Hero Damage per second for 8s.
notes: Any water damage pet that doesn't have set abilities can roll this.

name: Boulder
description: Roll a giant boulder through 5 enemies, dealing 1,500% crushing earth Hero Damage.
notes: Any earth damage pet that doesn't have set abilities can roll this.

name: Bouncing Fire
description: Fires a bouncing fireball piercing 5 enemies and dealing 1,100% fire Hero Damage.
notes: Any fire damage pet that doesn't have set abilities can roll this.

name: Bouncing Phoenix
description: Fires a bouncing phoenix that bounces to a nearby 10 enemies dealing 2,000% fire Hero Damage and explodes on the last target dealing the same damage to all nearby targets.
notes: Bound to the Fenix pet and its gold variant from Embermount Volcano.

name: Bouncing Shell
description: Fires a bouncing Shell that bounces to a nearby 10 enemies dealing 2,000% Hero Earth Damage and explodes on the last target dealing the same damage to all nearby targets.
notes: Bound to the premium pet Shinobi Turtle.

name: Bubble Entrapment
description: Fire a bubble that knocks up an enemy for 5 sec and deals 2,400% water Hero Damage.
notes: Any water damage pet that doesn't have set abilities can roll this.

name: Cat Wail
description: Scares enemies with cuteness, increasing their damage taken by 100% for 5s.
notes: Bound to Dapper Ghost Cat, Spooky Ghost Cat, and Ghost Cat.

name: Chain Lightning
description: Fire a lightning ball that can hit 4 enemies for 850% storm Hero Damage.
notes: Any storm damage pet that doesn't have set abilities can roll this.

name: Chained Saw
description: Fires a flying saw blade that deals 1,500% hero damage and returns to the player dealing damage on the way back.
notes: Bound to the premium pet Chainsaw Corgi.

name: Chi Blast
description: Fires a Chi Blast toward your enemies, dealing 2,000% magical Hero Damage.
notes: Bound to Voodoo Monk pet from Prime VII.

name: Curse Aura
description: Boosts speed by 50%, reduces enemy damage by 50% and deals 150% magical Hero Damage for 10s.
notes: Any Creeper pet without set abilities can roll this.

name: Cyclone
description: Increases speed by 50% and attacks deal 155% bonus earth Hero Damage for 6s.
notes: Bound to the premium pet Automeow.

name: Dragon Breath
description: Breathes fire in a frontal cone, dealing 200% magical Hero Damage per second for 5s.
notes: Any Dragon pet without set abilities can roll this.

name: Dragon Protection
description: Shields nearby defenses for 400% Hero Damage for 10s.
notes: Any Dragon pet without set abilities can roll this.

name: Drenching Wave
description: Rolls a wave dealing 625% water Hero Damage and drenching enemies for 5s.
notes: Any water damage pet that doesn't have set abilities can roll this.

name: Dust Devil
description: Fires a magical Stone that stirs up a heavy Sand Storm, slowing enemies by 40% and dealing 600% Hero Earth Damage every second for 10 seconds.
notes: Bound to the premium pet Earthen Dragon and its golden variant.

name: Encouragement
description: Uplift your spirit by restoring 75 blue mana!
notes: Any Gato pet without set abilities can roll this.

name: Field of Swords
description: Create a field of swords dealing 130% physical Hero Damage per second for 15s.
notes: Bound to Possesed Sword and Tainted Sword.

name: Fire Barrage
description: Fire 6 fireballs at your target, dealing 425% fire Hero Damage each.
notes: Any fire damage pet that doesn't have set abilities can roll this.

name: Fire Pillar
description: Creates a flaming pillar dealing 200% fire Hero Damage per second for 10s.
notes: Any fire damage pet that doesn't have set abilities can roll this.

name: Fire Shield
description: Gain a fire shield for 6s reflecting 1,500% damage taken before resist.
notes: Any fire damage pet that doesn't have set abilities can roll this.

name: Frost Shards
description: Fire 8 frost shards dealing 265% water Hero Damage each.
notes: Any water damage pet that doesn't have set abilities can roll this.

name: Frost Spike
description: Summons a chilling aura, creating frost spikes under all nearby foes that knock them up and deals 1,000% Frost Hero Damage.
notes: Only on Nutcracker, Penguin Commander, or Snow Mage pets (and gold variants).

name: Gato Fireworks
description: Fires a trio of fireworks dealing 915% magical Hero Damage each.
notes: Any Gato pet without set abilities can roll this.

name: Ghost Wail
description: Haunt enemies, increasing damage taken by 100% for 5s.
notes: All Dragolich pets can roll this.

name: Gravebolt
description: Fires a bolt at one enemy, dealing 2,500% magical Hero Damage and healing 3% of damage dealt.
notes: Any Creeper pet without set abilities can roll this.

name: Hawk Strike
description: Fires a piercing Flaming Hawk toward your enemies, dealing 2,000% magical Hero Damage.
notes: Bound to Voodoo Huntress pet from Prime VII.

name: Heavy Blizzard
description: Fires a magical snowball that stirs up a heavy blizzard, slowing enemies by 40% and dealing 600% Frost Damage every second for 10 seconds.
notes: Only on Nutcracker, Penguin Commander, or Snow Mage pets (and gold variants).

name: Hex
description: Nearby enemies take 1,250% magical Hero Damage and then deal 50% less damage for 9s.
notes: Any Creeper pet without set abilities can roll this.

name: Ice Ball
description: Roll an ice ball through 5 enemies, dealing 1,800% water Hero Damage.
notes: Any water damage pet that doesn't have set abilities can roll this.

name: Jackalope's Curse
description: Nearby enemies take 1,000% magical Hero Damage, deal 50% less damage, and take 50% extra damage for 9s.
notes: Any Jackalope and Corrupted Jackalope can roll this.

name: Jurassic War Cry
description: Resets all hero abilities cooldowns.
notes: Any Dino, Golden Dino, and Amber Dino pet can roll this.

name: Laser Eye
description: Fire a laser from your crystal eye at the enemies!
notes: Bound to Protobot pet. (More than likely a bug in the game)

name: Lightning Grenade
description: Lob a sticky grenade that detonates on enemies dealing 2,000% storm Hero Damage.
notes: Any storm damage pet that doesn't have set abilities can roll this.

name: Lil Betsy Projectile
description: Fires a bolt dealing 2,500% magical Hero Damage and reducing enemy damage by 50% for 8s.
notes: Can be rolled on all Betsy-type pets.

name: Maelstorm
description: A maelstorm reduces speed and attacks by 40% and deals 220% Hero Damage per second for 8s.
notes: Bound to Unbound Bearkira and Bearkira.

name: Magical Burst
description: Fires 5 Magical Burst dealing 355% magical Hero Damage each.
notes: Bound to Corrupted Genie Prince pet.

name: Mana Swirl
description: Restores 500 Ability Mana.
notes: Bound to Genie Prince pet.

name: Metsu Gatodouken
description: Fire a devastating magical blast dealing 2,500% Hero Damage and knockback to one enemy.
notes: Bound to the premium pet Katkarot.

name: Oil Spit
description: Lobs an oiling blob at enemies, dealing 1,500% earth Hero Damage and slowing them by 40% for 5s.
notes: Any earth damage pet that doesn't have set abilities can roll this.

name: Overcharged Laser
description: Fire a devastating magical blast dealing 2,500% magical Fire Hero Damage and knockback to one enemy.
notes: Bound to the premium pet Cyberdragon.

name: Plague Claw
description: Calls forth a claw dealing 650% magical Hero Damage, increasing x1.5 per hit for the first 5 hits.
notes: Bound to Scourge Dragon and Blighted Dragon.

name: Poison Cloud
description: Fires a magical Snotball that stirs up a cloud of poison gas, dealing 600% Poison Hero Damage every second for 10 seconds.
notes: Bound to Slimy Ghost Cat pet.

name: Poison Shield
description: Gain shield for 7s reflecting 1,750% damage before resist.
notes: Any earth damage pet that doesn't have set abilities can roll this.

name: Poison Spit
description: Fires a Poison bolt dealing 2,000% earth Hero Damage and 150% damage per second for 6s.
notes: Any earth damage pet that doesn't have set abilities can roll this.

name: Poisonous Tips
description: Attacks deal 120% bonus earth damage for 8s.
notes: Any earth damage pet that doesn't have set abilities can roll this.

name: Radial Blast
description: Fires 8 plasma projectiles dealing 265% magical Hero Damage each.
notes: Bound to the premium pet G4-T0.

name: Ring of Fire
description: Unleashes a blast of blue flames burning enemies hit for 500% of your hero damage igniting them for 6 seconds.
notes: Any Friendly Ghost pet can roll this (and gold variant).

name: Rock Throw
description: Throw a rock dealing 2,500% earth Hero Damage and knockback to one enemy.
notes: Any earth damage pet that doesn't have set abilities can roll this.

name: Sandstorm
description: Increases speed by 50% and attacks deal 115% bonus earth Hero Damage for 7s.
notes: Any earth damage pet that doesn't have set abilities can roll this.

name: Sharknado (Xbox Only)
description: A sharknado reduces enemy speed by 40% and deals 175% water Hero Damage per second for 6s.
notes: Bound to the Megadon pet (Xbox exclusive) dropping on Drakenfrost Resort.

name: Shinku Gatodouken
description: Fire a devastating magical blast dealing 2,500% Hero Damage and knockback to one enemy.
notes: Bound to the premium pet Katkarot.

name: Shock Shield
description: Gain a storm shield for 7s that reflects 2,000% damage taken before resists.
notes: Any storm damage pet that doesn't have set abilities can roll this.

name: Short Fuse
description: Piercing orb deals 600% storm Hero Damage and 200% storm Hero Damage per second for 6s.
notes: Any storm damage pet that doesn't have set abilities can roll this.

name: Shuriken Fury
description: Fires 6 shurikens dealing 355% magical Hero Damage each.
notes: Bound to the premium pet Shinobi Kitty.

name: Snow Storm
description: Decreases speed by 25% and attacks deal 165% bonus Frost Damage for 5s.
notes: Only on Nutcracker, Penguin Commander, or Snow Mage pets (and gold variants).

name: Snowball
description: Fire a snowball dealing 2,750% water Hero Damage to one enemy.
notes: Any water damage pet that doesn't have set abilities can roll this.

name: Soothing Water
description: Magical waters restore 300% Hero Damage as health.
notes: Any water damage pet that doesn't have set abilities can roll this.

name: Sparkle Party
description: Dazzles nearby enemies for 1,000% magical Hero Damage and stunning them for 5s.
notes: Any Gato pet without set abilities can roll this.

name: Stalagmite
description: Stalagmites knockup nearby foes and deals 1,000% earth Hero Damage.
notes: Any earth damage pet that doesn't have set abilities can roll this.

name: Sticky Bomb
description: Throws a sticky bomb that deals 1,000% hero damage on impact and spreads mini bombs to nearby target dealing 500% hero damage.
notes: Any Kobold King and Kobold Bling King pet can roll this.

name: Stinky Pits
description: Deals 300% earth Hero Damage each second for 6s to nearby enemies.
notes: Any earth damage pet that doesn't have set abilities can roll this.

name: Stranglethorn
description: Fires a piercing vine that stuns and deals 180% earth hero damage per second for 5s.
notes: Any earth damage pet that doesn't have set abilities can roll this.

name: Sword Beam
description: Fires a Beam toward your enemies, dealing 2,000% magical Hero Damage.
notes: Bound to Voodoo Squire pet from Prime VII.

name: Table Flip
description: Flip table at an enemy dealing 2,750% magical Hero Damage.
notes: Bound to the premium pet Table Flipper.

name: Thunderstorm
description: Creates a thunderstorm dealing 750% storm Hero Damage per second for 3s.
notes: Bound to Thunder-O and Reforged Thunder-O.

name: Tormented Thoughts
description: Enemies take 150% magical Hero Damage per second for 8s and explode for 400% on death.
notes: Bound to the premium pet Headless Horseman.

name: Tornado
description: Fires a Tornado toward your enemies, dealing 1,850% magical Hero Damage and knocking up enemies for 5s.
notes: Bound to Voodoo Apprentice pet from Prime VII.

name: Tsunami
description: Rolls a wave dealing 3,000% water Hero Damage and drenching enemies for 5s.
notes: Any Haunted Ship pet can roll this (and gold variant).

name: Unified Defense
description: Shields for 6 sec, reflecting 750% water damage and dealing 400% water Hero Damage per second.
notes: Bound to Narwhagon and Left Narwhagon.

name: Void Tendrils
description: Fires piercing void tendrils, stunning enemies and dealing 175% magical Hero Damage over 7s.
notes: Bound to the premium pet Evilwick.

name: Whirlwind
description: Increases speed by 50% and attacks deal 155% bonus electric Hero Damage for 6s.
notes: Bound to the premium pet Cyborgie.
